Title: CS 381K: Artificial Intelligence
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 19:23:47 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1250 Last-Modified: Friday, 21-Jul-95 20:06:08 GMT CS 381K: Artificial Intelligence CS 381K: Artificial Intelligence Artificial Intelligence (AI) may be defined as the study of the computations required for intelligent behavior and the attempt to duplicate such computations using computers.
